text: The entire Israelite community assembled at Shiloh and there they set up the tent of meeting. Though they had subdued the land,

<st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelite</st> <st data-num="07626" class="">tribes</st> <st data-num="03498 0834">had</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> been <st data-num="02505" class="">assigned</st> their <st data-num="05159" class="">allotted land</st>.<n id="1" />
So Joshua said to the Israelites: “How long do you intend to put off occupying the land the Lord God of your ancestors has given you?

<st data-num="03051" class="">Pick</st> <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> from each <st data-num="07626" class="">tribe</st>. I will <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> them <st data-num="07971" class="">out</st> to <st data-num="06965 01980">walk</st> through the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> and <st data-num="03789" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="06310 05159">map</st> of it <st data-num="0935 0413">for</st> me.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="02505" class="">Divide</st> it into <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="02506" class="">regions</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> will <st data-num="05975" class="">stay</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> its <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> in the <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st> and the <st data-num="01004" class="">family</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="05975 05921">in</st> its <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> in the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st>.
But as for you, map out the land into seven regions and bring it to me. I will draw lots for you here before the Lord our God.

But the Levites will not have an allotted portion among you, for their inheritance is to serve the Lord. Gad, Reuben, and the half-tribe of Manasseh have already received their allotted land east of the Jordan, which Moses the Lord’s servant assigned them.”
When the men started out, Joshua told those going to map out the land, “Go, walk through the land, map it out, and return to me. Then I will draw lots for you before the Lord here in Shiloh.”

The <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">journeyed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05674" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> and <st data-num="03789" class="">mapped</st> it and its <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> <st data-num="03789" class="">out</st> into <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="02506" class="">regions</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="05612" class="">scroll</st>. Then they <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st> in <st data-num="07887" class="">Shiloh</st>.
Joshua drew lots for them in Shiloh before the Lord and divided the land among the Israelites according to their allotted portions.
The first lot belonged to the tribe of Benjamin by its clans. Their allotted territory was between Judah and Joseph.

Their <st data-num="06285 06828">northern</st> <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">started</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st>, <st data-num="05927 01366">went up</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03802" class="">slope</st> of <st data-num="03405" class="">Jericho</st><n id="1" /> on the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st>, <st data-num="05927" class="">ascended</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">westward</st> to the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st>, and <st data-num="01961 08444">extended</st> to the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st> of <st data-num="01007" class="">Beth Aven</st>.

<st data-num="01366" class="">It</st> then <st data-num="05674" class="">crossed</st> from <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> to <st data-num="03870" class="">Luz</st>, <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03802" class="">slope</st> of <st data-num="03870" class="">Luz</st> to the <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st> (<st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> is, <st data-num="01008" class="">Bethel)</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="01366 03381">descended</st> to <st data-num="05853" class="">Ataroth Addar</st> located <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st> of <st data-num="08481" class="">lower</st> <st data-num="01032" class="">Beth Horon</st>.

<st data-num="01366" class="">It</st> then <st data-num="08388 05437">turned</st> on the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="05045" class="">southward</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="02022 0834">hill</st> <st data-num="05921 06440">near</st> <st data-num="01032" class="">Beth Horon</st> on the <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st> and <st data-num="01961 08444">extended</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="07154" class="">Kiriath Baal</st> (<st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> is, <st data-num="07157" class="">Kiriath Jearim</st>), a <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> belonging to the <st data-num="01121" class="">tribe</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>. <st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is the <st data-num="03220" class="">western</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">border</st>.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="05045" class="">southern</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> started on the <st data-num="07097" class="">edge</st> of <st data-num="07157" class="">Kiriath Jearim</st> and <st data-num="03318 01366">extended</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">westward</st> <st data-num="03318 0413">to</st> the <st data-num="04599" class="">spring</st> of the <st data-num="04325" class="">waters</st> of <st data-num="05318" class="">Nephtoah</st>.

The <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> then <st data-num="03381" class="">descended</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="07097" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="02022 0834">hill country</st> <st data-num="05921 06440">near</st> the <st data-num="01516" class="">Valley</st> of <st data-num="01121" class="">Ben</st> <st data-num="02011" class="">Hinnom</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">located</st> in the <st data-num="06010" class="">Valley</st> of the <st data-num="07497" class="">Rephaites</st> to the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st>. It <st data-num="03381" class="">descended</st> through the <st data-num="01516" class="">Valley</st> of <st data-num="02011" class="">Hinnom</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03802" class="">slope</st> of the <st data-num="02983" class="">Jebusites</st> to the <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st> and then <st data-num="03381" class="">down</st> to <st data-num="05883" class="">En Rogel</st>.

It <st data-num="08388" class="">went</st> <st data-num="06828" class="">northward</st>, <st data-num="03318" class="">extending to</st> <st data-num="05885" class="">En Shemesh</st> <st data-num="03318 0413">and</st> <st data-num="01553" class="">Geliloth</st> <st data-num="0834 05227">opposite</st> the <st data-num="04608" class="">Pass</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="0131" class="">Adummim</st>, and <st data-num="03381" class="">descended</st> to the <st data-num="068" class="">Stone</st> of <st data-num="0932" class="">Bohan</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="07205" class="">Reuben</st>.

It <st data-num="05674" class="">crossed</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03802" class="">slope</st> <st data-num="04136" class="">in front of</st> the <st data-num="06160" class="">rift valley</st> to the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> and <st data-num="03381" class="">descended</st> into the <st data-num="06160" class="">rift valley</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="01366" class="">It</st> then <st data-num="05674" class="">crossed</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03802" class="">slope</st> of <st data-num="01031" class="">Beth Hoglah</st> to the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> and <st data-num="01961 08444 01366">ended</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="06828" class="">northern</st> <st data-num="03956" class="">tip</st> of the <st data-num="04417" class="">Salt</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">Sea</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="07097 05045">mouth</st> of the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> River.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02088" class="">This</st> was the <st data-num="05045" class="">southern</st> <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st>.
The Jordan River bordered it on the east. These were the borders of the land assigned to the tribe of Benjamin by its clans.
These cities belonged to the tribe of Benjamin by its clans: Jericho, Beth Hoglah, Emek Keziz,
<st data-num="01026" class="">Beth Arabah</st>, <st data-num="06787" class="">Zemaraim</st>, <st data-num="01008" class="">Bethel</st>,<n id="1" />
<st data-num="05761" class="">Avvim</st>, <st data-num="06511" class="">Parah</st>, <st data-num="06084" class="">Ophrah</st>,
Kephar Ammoni, Ophni, and Geba—a total of 12 cities and their towns.
Gibeon, Ramah, Beeroth,
<st data-num="04708" class="">Mizpah</st>, <st data-num="03716" class="">Kephirah</st>, <st data-num="04681" class="">Mozah</st>,
<st data-num="07552" class="">Rekem</st>, <st data-num="03416" class="">Irpeel</st>, <st data-num="08634" class="">Taralah</st>,
Zelah, Haeleph, the Jebusite city (that is, Jerusalem), Gibeah, and Kiriath—a total of fourteen cities and their towns. This was the land assigned to the tribe of Benjamin by its clans.
